mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, total_questions as totalQuestions, deadline, is_completed as isCompleted, created_at as createdAt, difficulty, teacher_name as teacherName, subject, chapter FROM assignment ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, title, description, total_questions as totalQuestions, deadline, is_completed as isCompleted, created_at as createdAt, difficulty, teacher_name as teacherName, subject, chapter FROM assignment WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assignment (title, description, total_questions, deadline, is_completed, created_at, difficulty, teacher_name, subject, chapter) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{totalQuestions}, #{deadline}, #{isCompleted}, #{createdAt}, #{difficulty}, #{teacherName}, #{subject}, #{chapter})
mapper.update: UPDATE assignment SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, total_questions = #{totalQuestions}, deadline = #{deadline}, is_completed = #{isCompleted}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, teacher_name = #{teacherName}, subject = #{subject}, chapter = #{chapter} WHERE id = #{id}
